response.overview: Like many girls in the Valley, Jenny Densuke had dreams of being a movie star, but the struggles of being a model in such a competitive industry was beginning to wear her down. So when her boyfriend David found her a gig in the small town of Erie, PA, Jenny took the leap of faith and got on a plane to begin the adventure of a lifetime as the new contract girl for amateur porn star Marie Madison. Featuring hot sex and hilarious hijinx, Regarding Jenny is the first adult feature in over a decade to star an Abyss Creations RealDoll in the lead roll.
response.title: Regarding Jenny: A RealDoll Adventure
